channel.title: Donations on PayPal
channel.description:
Hello everyone IoTh1nkN0t (unh0lys0da) here,
So apparantly some people have been having trouble with donating PayPal. Can these people pm me with the error they got and the method of payment?
Yours truly,
IoTh1nkN0t
